title: AST to Platelet Ratio Index (APRI) Calculator - Hepatitis C
snippet: Enter the required values to calculate the APRI value. The APRI Score will appear in the oval on the far right (highlighted in yellow). Most experts recommend using 40 IU/L as the value for the AST upper limit of normal when calculating an APRI value.

title: AST to Platelet Ratio Index (APRI) - MDCalc
snippet: The AST to Platelet Ratio Index (APRI) determines the likelihood of hepatic fibrosis and cirrhosis in patients with Hepatitis C.

title: Apri: Package Insert / Prescribing Information - Drugs.com
snippet: Dec 19, 2025 · Apri package insert / prescribing information for healthcare professionals. Includes: indications, dosage, adverse reactions and pharmacology.

title: APRI Calculator
snippet: The APRI calculator computes the AST to Platelet Ratio Index (APRI), which we use to predict fibrosis and cirrhosis. Calculating a patient's APRI score allows clinicians to easily predict hepatic fibrosis without performing a more invasive medical tests, e.g., biopsy.

title: What Is the APRI Score? - WebMD
snippet: Oct 1, 2024 · APRI is short for aspartate aminotransferase to platelet ratio index. It’s a way for doctors to measure how healthy your liver is when you have a liver disease.
